n: Slow Cooker Fruit, Nuts, and Spice Oatmeal
des: "A delicious, creamy oatmeal that's slow-cooked overnight with apples, cinnamon, cranberries, almonds, and pecans.  A great way to wake up in the morning!  Serve with brown sugar and milk. Enjoy. "
ins: Combine the oats, apple, cranberries, almonds, pecans, water, milk, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, and butter in a slow cooker. Cook on Low overnight or 8 hours.
